text: Alice des Clayes (1891–1968) was a Scottish painter. Born in Aberdeen, she emigrated to Montreal, Quebec in 1914. des Clayes returned to England in 1938. Her work is included in the collections of the Musée national des beaux-arts du Québec, and the National Gallery of Canadahttps://www.gallery.ca/collection/artist/alice-des-clayes ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1968 deaths Category:20th-century Scottish artists
title: Alice des Clayes
